lyrics.text:
‘Oi! Ke u tala hoku monū!
Kuo te ma’u ‘a e fanau’i fo’ou.
Hoko ‘a e maama ki he po’uli,
Hiki ‘a e mate ki he mo’ui.
Hoku monū ē, ‘eku koloa,
‘Ete ongo’i he taimi kotoa
Fakamo’oni fakapapau
Fale ‘a e Eiki ‘iate au.

Taha ‘a e ‘ofa, taha e me’a!
Kuo te hoko ko Hono ‘ea:
‘Ea mo e ‘Alo ne Ne pekia,
Si’ono foha huo ohia.
Hoku monū ē, etc.

Si’i Laumālie kuo Ne hu
Hoku loto ni, ke fai hono teu:
Fakamo’ui hono mahaki,
Lingi ‘a e fiefia ‘o langi.
Hoku monū ē, etc.

Hangē ha maama, hangē ha lea,
Hangē vangana he vai ne tafea
‘I Kolo Tapu, ‘o nau ongo’i,
Pehē ‘a e anga hoku nofo’i.
Hoku monū ē, etc.

Ma’upu hake ‘iate au
Si’ene o’i ke u laka atu:
O’i ke u tu’u ‘o ‘oua totolo,
Ma’uma’u atu ki he loloto,
Hoku monū ē, etc.

Hoku Sikaina ‘i he Toafa,
Hoku Pou-’ao mo hoku Poumaama,
Te Ne a’utaki ki he Fonua,
Te Ne ‘ohake ki he ‘Otua,
Hoku monū ē, ‘eku koloa,
‘Ete ongo’i he taimi kotoa
Fakamo’oni fakapapau
Fale ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘iate au.
